@startuml
!theme cerulean-outline

actor User
participant "Web Browser" as Browser
participant "API Gateway" as Gateway
participant "Auth Service" as Auth
participant "Order Service" as Order
database "Database" as DB

User -> Browser: Login Request
Browser -> Gateway: POST /api/login
Gateway -> Auth: Authenticate User
Auth -> DB: Query User Credentials
DB --> Auth: User Data
Auth -> Auth: Validate Password
Auth --> Gateway: JWT Token
Gateway --> Browser: Response (Token)
Browser --> User: Display Dashboard

User -> Browser: Create Order
Browser -> Gateway: POST /api/orders
Gateway -> Auth: Validate Token
Auth --> Gateway: Token Valid
Gateway -> Order: Create Order Request
Order -> DB: Save Order
DB --> Order: Order Created
Order --> Gateway: Order Response
Gateway --> Browser: Success
Browser --> User: Order Confirmation

@enduml
